001package com.example.app;
002
003import com.example.geometry.Circle;
004import com.example.geometry.Rectangle;
005import com.example.geometry.Shape;
006import com.example.util.Strings;
007
008import java.util.List;
009
010/**
011 * Demo application that exercises the geometry model.
012 *
013 * <p>Run this class from the command line to see formatted output.</p>
014 *
015 * @author ChatGPT
016 * @version 1.0
017 * @since 1.0
018 */
019public final class Main {
020    /**
021     * Program entry point.
022     *
023     * @param args ignored
024     */
025    public static void main(String[] args) {
026        List<Shape> shapes = List.of(
027                new Circle(3),
028                new Rectangle(4, 2),
029                new Circle(0.5),
030                new Rectangle(10, 0.75)
031        );
032
033        System.out.println("Shapes Demo");
034        System.out.println("-----------");
035        for (Shape s : shapes) {
036            String name = Strings.leftPad(s.describe(), ' ', 22);
037            System.out.printf("%s  |  area=%8.3f  perimeter=%8.3f%n",
038                    name, s.area(), s.perimeter());
039        }
040    }
041}
